summary: The KerberosError class provides a unified exception for Kerberos-related SMB errors across different SMB protocol versions, excluding NETBIOS errors. It offers methods to retrieve error codes, packets, and messages, facilitating consistent error handling in client applications.
business_intent: Enable client applications to catch a single, version-agnostic exception for Kerberos-related SMB errors and retrieve detailed error information such as code, packet, and message.
